Texts.Eng: Here you go, Captain! Your very own Missile Pod! I'm also giving you the blueprints for the weapon, in case you ever need to craft another one.

In order to repair that missile pod of yours, I need some materials. I'll need at least ^orange;8 Superb Kavanite Plates ^white;and a ^orange;Dranite Plate ^white;to craft a new frame, an ^orange;Avikan Magazine ^white;to fix the loading mechanism, and some ^orange;Volatile Liquid ^white;for the ignition system. ^green;Bring me those materials^white;, and I can fix up that missile pod for you.
